amendment.description: At the end of the bill before the short title, insert the following: LIMITATION ON USE OF FUNDS SEC.___. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to eliminate the Urban Wildlife Refuge Partnership.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to eliminate the Urban Wildlife Refuge Partnership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A084) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A084) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A084) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A084) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
